subSubSection.paragraph:
First recorded from Finland by
Zatwarnicki and Kahanpaeae (2014)
. Widespread in Europe, it is also found in North Africa ( Zatwarnicki 2013 ). The illustrated record by
Kahanpaeae (2013)
represents Parydra nigritarsis Strobl, 1893.
